Name: Food Drive: Race against Hunger
About the game: Help feed hungry families in need across various towns. Join Gamers for Good in spreading awareness of the critical need for food banks across the world. Let yourself get caught up in this arcade race against time to keep everyone in town fed. As you speed around town in a dash to collect food crates and get them distributed to the hungry people you will enjoy beautiful art and catchy tunes. You are given 4 minutes to collect and deliver as many food packages as you can. Try your best to top the leaderboard and be the hunger solution. Collect as many hearts as you can find around the map to unlock new track skins/charities.
